k. Use of SAG or AFTRA Talent
As you know, SAG and AFTRA need notification whenever member talent
is used for public service spots. Both have agreed to accept notification
by wire instead of the usual letter when time is short. Just in case any
spots have been made without SAG or AFTRA notification when appropriate,
protection can be assured by sending a memo to the organizations involved,
listing performers, media and length of spots. Both SAG and AFTRA are
cooperating completely in the Youth Opportunity program, and have
mentioned this to us for protection of their members as well as those of
us making spots.
Dan Seymour
